storyInfo: Lavinia pursues Ingrid, but the head of the Venezia Trucking Co, Venezia Junior steps in personally to end the chase. Ingrid refuses his invitation to return to the family, but she then learns from Lappland that the old tailor's grandson is currently being held within the Venezia residence.

attributes.content: <p=2>November 7th, 1100    8:30 A.M.</>
attributes.name: group_location_stamp

attributes.content: Judge Lavinia, the Vulpo was just sighted in this area.
attributes.name: Police Officer

attributes.content: She's a sharp one. Practically stays in a new place every day. We investigated every place she's been and only figured out her approximate location.
attributes.name: Police Officer

attributes.content: Ingrid Venezia.
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: Back in law school, my jurisprudence professor mentioned the name once, but it didn't even come to my mind last night.
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: She told us Siracusa's cruel and conflictive atmosphere stems not from the local races here, but originates from the land itself...
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: Her rationale for how a gentle Vulpo could turn into a 'Vulpo even more ruthless than a wolf' after coming to Siracusa—and our laws are to rein in this sort of inevitable evolution.
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: Ingrid has more than twenty criminal records spread out between five nomadic city courts, each one corresponding to a spike in the Venezias' influence in the area...
attributes.name: Police Officer

attributes.content: The famiglia has also always tried their best to keep her away from any revenge killings or court trials.
attributes.name: Police Officer

attributes.content: Rumor has it that Venezia senior even favored her more than his actual daughter.
attributes.name: Police Officer

attributes.content: But in 1094, Ingrid suddenly left the famiglia.
attributes.name: Police Officer

attributes.content: Left?
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: More accurately, she defected.
attributes.name: Police Officer

attributes.content: Venezia Trucking expanded their business to Terni then. Famiglia Tancredi was actively provoking the other side so they could plunder the local alloy deposits. The conflict intensified and eventually escalated into a gang war.
attributes.name: Police Officer

attributes.content: The two Grey Hall famiglie were practically locked in a cycle of violence, and they even tried to put a hit out on Venezia senior...
attributes.name: Police Officer

attributes.content: Ingrid went into a killing spree, taking down more than ten of the Tancredis' made men.
attributes.name: Police Officer

attributes.content: Strange thing is, when Signora Sicilia personally came down and the two famiglie finally managed to start negotiations... Ingrid ignored the don's order to stop and continued her slaughter.
attributes.name: Police Officer

attributes.content: I saw the records. The stuff she did... freaks me out even now.
attributes.name: Police Officer

attributes.content: Motive?
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: Unclear.
attributes.name: Police Officer

attributes.content: Anyway, Ingrid basically challenged Signora Sicilia's authority with her actions, but vanished without a trace after that...
attributes.name: Police Officer

attributes.content: The entire Famiglia Venezia was blamed for this, and they almost met the same fate as Famiglia Texas.
attributes.name: Police Officer

attributes.content: The young judge imagines the Vulpo taking lives in the city, along with the smile that never left her face while they were at the winery yesterday.
Judge?
attributes.name: Police Officer

attributes.content: A top killer from a famiglia, with many murder cases under her hands, suddenly appearing in Nuova Volsinii... right in time for Carnevale. We can't let her move as she pleases.
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: You mean...
attributes.name: Police Officer

attributes.content: The famiglie here have all passed their background checks. Every member and weapon is registered and strictly regulated...
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: Someone like Ingrid is likely to act as another person's blade, regardless of whether she knows it or not.
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: We need to capture her first at all costs.
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: Yes. But... this area is huge. We still haven't managed to nail down her exact location yet.
attributes.name: Police Officer

attributes.content: If the information about her and her daughter is accurate, I'm sure she's headed towards a certain place.
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: Lavinia looks toward an inconspicuous sign not far away from them—'Rhodes Island Branch Office'.
*sigh* The shop I often go to source materials is about to close for Carnevale.
attributes.name: Engineering Operator

attributes.content: We'll need to update our reserve count on the terminal in advance.
attributes.name: Engineering Operator

attributes.content: How's Vigil's doing? The landship dispatched a doctor to the hospital, but we haven't gotten any news since.
attributes.name: Engineering Operator

attributes.content: Dunno. The support mission this time has a high confidentiality level, and I don't have enough clearance to check his latest data.
attributes.name: Medic Operator

attributes.content: I looked for Penance earlier, and she seems hesitant to share too much to us.
attributes.name: Medic Operator

attributes.content: Let's trust our colleagues. We just need to complete our support logistical work.
attributes.name: Engineering Operator

attributes.content: Erm... There's a new notice on PRTS: 'Approved: Application to increase security level of Nuova Volsinii branch office', requested by...
attributes.name: Medic Operator

attributes.content: Penance?
attributes.name: Medic Operator

attributes.content: There's a Rhodes Island safehouse here too... I see these Rhodes Islanders are like tuskbeasts. Dig many hideouts for themselves.
attributes.name: Lunacub

attributes.content: *huff*... Don't attract any attention... Focus on recovering my strength—
attributes.name: Lunacub

attributes.content: *stomach groans*
Lunacub huddles between the ceiling and a ventilation duct, rubbing her empty belly with some frustration.
...I smell something sweet. Like honey.
attributes.name: Lunacub

attributes.content: No, I need to focus. Got to sharpen my arrows while time is on my side—
attributes.name: Lunacub

attributes.content: I can eat first? But Agnese, didn't you say I have to be patient while I'm out hunting—
attributes.name: Lunacub

attributes.content: My stomach can wait. I don't want you to lose.
attributes.name: Lunacub

attributes.content: Yup, I'll do everything else as you say, except for this. I don't want to let you down.
attributes.name: Lunacub

attributes.content: Lunacub hides in a corner, grabbing her bow and taking aim, almost instinctively.
(Not a wolf. It's the kind of smell that Agnese hates.)
attributes.name: Lunacub

attributes.content: My nose isn't sharp enough to tell which one you are.
attributes.name: Ingrid

attributes.content: But I know one of you is hiding in here.
attributes.name: Ingrid

attributes.content: You have ten seconds to leave this place. I'll wait for you outside.
attributes.name: Ingrid

attributes.content: Of course, it won't be hard for me to get around Rhodes Island employees to deal with you, but I'd rather not take the risk.
attributes.name: Ingrid

attributes.content: So do me a favor. I'm trying my best to avoid leaving a bad impression on Lisa's coworkers.
attributes.name: Ingrid

attributes.content: I guess there's no more room for discussion—
attributes.name: Ingrid

attributes.content: A timely response. Interesting.
attributes.name: Ingrid

attributes.content: I suggest everyone put their weapons down.
attributes.name: Guard Operator

attributes.content: We've sealed the exits and activated all defense systems, so let's not make it any worse.
attributes.name: Guard Operator

attributes.content: You set a trap for me?
attributes.name: Lunacub

attributes.content: Um... trap?
attributes.name: Guard Operator

attributes.content: It's just our regular security system at work.
attributes.name: Guard Operator

attributes.content: Rhodes Island truly does not disappoint.
attributes.name: Ingrid

attributes.content: I assure you we're just protecting our own assets, miss.
attributes.name: Guard Operator

attributes.content: If the two of you could just wait a moment. The government will soon take things over from here.
attributes.name: Guard Operator

attributes.content: (Agnese, any ideas to get out of here? Agnese? Agnese... where are you?)
attributes.name: Lunacub

attributes.content: We meet again, Ingrid.
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: An unregistered visitor using a deadly weapon inside the city and vandalizing assets belonging to a legitimate company.
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: This time, you will have to come with me for an investigation.
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: And her?
attributes.name: Ingrid

attributes.content: Ingrid points at the girl who is still warily observing the situation developing around her.
*sigh* We'll bring her along too.
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: Agnese needs me.
attributes.name: Lunacub

attributes.content: My hunt hasn't ended yet—
attributes.name: Lunacub

attributes.content: *stomach groans*
Everyone present turns to look at the source of the sound in unison.
We'll get some food for you.
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: Please, Signora Venezia. I don't wish to have the police act.
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: You want to protect her?
attributes.name: Ingrid

attributes.content: That is something for us to consider.
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: Alright, I'll come along. Only because you have my respect, Lavinia.
attributes.name: Ingrid

attributes.content: Judge Lavinia, we're done with their pre-registrations.
attributes.name: Government Clerk

attributes.content: The rest of the process will be a breeze.
attributes.name: Government Clerk

attributes.content: I said I'd cooperate, didn't I?
attributes.name: Ingrid

attributes.content: Leon told me about the game. You're in it too? Like her?
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: Lavinia looks at Lunacub.
Um, grazie mille for the honey biscuits.
attributes.name: Lunacub

attributes.content: Lunacub gobbles down her food as she keeps her eyes on everyone around her.
So can I leave already? I have important things to do.
attributes.name: Lunacub

attributes.content: I'm no Fang, Lavinia. I told you, I'm just a mother in search of justice for her daughter.
attributes.name: Ingrid

attributes.content: Hands off my bow!
attributes.name: Lunacub

attributes.content: Judge, shouldn't we take her in? What if—
attributes.name: Government Clerk

attributes.content: Don't worry, I know what I'm doing.
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: Remember me, Lunacub? Don't be rash, the police have already locked down this area.
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: Stay by my side. It'll be good for all of us. You can trust me.
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: I only trust Agnese.
attributes.name: Lunacub

attributes.content: Bernardo trusted me too.
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: ...He's dead.
attributes.name: Lunacub

attributes.content: But his heir still lives.
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: I-I want to ask Agnese about this. But she hasn't been replying me for a while.
attributes.name: Lunacub

attributes.content: Stay with me, and you won't have to worry about getting into trouble. You'll have more time to contact Agnese too.
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: Ingrid quietly watches Lavinia as she persuades Lunacub.
The girl covered with a wild scent is hesitating. Ingrid knows an opportunity approaches.
If Lavinia can get Agnese's Fang under control, that will save Ingrid a lot of trouble.
The other Fang in hiding will surely come to her.
If you notified me earlier, this misunderstanding we're having here could have been settled in a much more decent manner.
Long time no see, sorella.
Signor Antonio.
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: Salve, Judge Lavinia. I made my way here just to submit the required documents and company testimonials, to help Ingrid Venezia complete her identification registration.
attributes.name: Antonio

attributes.content: You—
attributes.name: Ingrid

attributes.content: Leave this to me, sorella. We Venezias have always been happily cooperative with the government.
attributes.name: Antonio

attributes.content: Your Honor, I know Ingrid's recent actions have violated a couple of rules of Nuova Volsinii, but I believe none of them are serious?
attributes.name: Antonio

attributes.content: Let's see: not registering on entry, using personal weapons in public spaces... oh, and vandalizing legitimate company assets, yes?
attributes.name: Antonio

attributes.content: ...Yes.
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: Regarding the last item, Venezia Trucking will discuss compensation with the involved company as soon as we are able.
attributes.name: Antonio

attributes.content: Signor Venezia, you can just tell me what you want.
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: Bail. I'd like to bring my sister back home, everyone misses her so much.
attributes.name: Antonio

attributes.content: Wait, Antonio. I didn't want to drag the family in. There's no need for you to fight with city hall for me.
attributes.name: Ingrid

attributes.content: It's not just for you, sorella. It's for the famiglia too. You may have your own opinions, but papa and I still regard you as one of ours.
attributes.name: Antonio

attributes.content: I want every Venezia to have a clean record in Nuova Volsinii.
attributes.name: Antonio

attributes.content: Besides, there's no need to censor the word 'famiglia' here. Everyone knows it's the foundation of our very lives. Nuova Volsinii just wants a declaration from us.
attributes.name: Antonio

attributes.content: Forgive me for my candidness, Judge Lavinia.
attributes.name: Antonio

attributes.content: I understand, your company's enduring cooperative nature with us relies on both sides being honest with each other.
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: However, are you sure you want to stake the entire company's reputation to vouch for Ingrid, Signor Venezia?
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: Why not? It would have been the same with the old don.
attributes.name: Antonio

attributes.content: Venezia Trucking will ensure the government that Ingrid Venezia will not step afoul of the law during her post-bail probation period.
attributes.name: Antonio

attributes.content: If you find any clear evidence of her doing so, I will personally accompany her at court.
attributes.name: Antonio

attributes.content: Lavinia's head hurts. The other party's request does comply perfectly with standard procedures.
Ingrid does have a right to be released on bail, but... it shouldn't happen now.
I can't refuse you, can I? You really excel at dealing with the government, Signore.
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: Because I know you are not the inflexible type.
attributes.name: Antonio

attributes.content: After all, I can clearly tell you know our little friend here with the huge bow, and you have no problems with her actions either.
attributes.name: Antonio

attributes.content: Andiamo, sorella.
attributes.name: Antonio

attributes.content: Someone else will handle the formalities for you. I know why you're back in Siracusa, we can help you with Lisa's matter.
attributes.name: Antonio

attributes.content: Venezia... are you involved as well?
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: —Aaaaahh!
attributes.name: Flustered Government Clerk

attributes.content: What's wrong?
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: I-I just got bitten by a tuskbeast that came out of nowhere!
attributes.name: Flustered Government Clerk

attributes.content: A tuskbeast?
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: Wait—where's Lunacub?
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: Isn't she right next to—
attributes.name: Flustered Government Clerk

attributes.content: She suddenly freezes—there is only air.
Where did she go?
attributes.name: Flustered Government Clerk

attributes.content: Your Honor, we just engaged with a very agile individual.
attributes.name: Calm Officer

attributes.content: She was mumbling something about wilderness survival skills and an Agnese, we couldn't stop her... we sent some men to chase after her.
attributes.name: Calm Officer

attributes.content: I got it.
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: To be honest, I thought we'd never get a chance to see each other again until the famiglia started considering an expansion in Higashi, sister.
attributes.name: Antonio

attributes.content: Stop calling me that, Antonio. We were never that close, and I'm no longer part of the family.
attributes.name: Ingrid

attributes.content: Alright.
attributes.name: Antonio

attributes.content: Judging from their attitude towards you, I see you'll be the next don.
attributes.name: Ingrid

attributes.content: You're looking more and more like the Don—not just your attitude, but your appearance as well.
attributes.name: Ingrid

attributes.content: Your ears and tail... Did you become more like Bella after your marriage, or have you gotten some work done?
attributes.name: Ingrid

attributes.content: Ingrid, why are you still like this...
attributes.name: Antonio

attributes.content: You don't like it when people make fun of you, but you don't hold back when you're on the offensive.
attributes.name: Antonio

attributes.content: Really now?
attributes.name: Ingrid

attributes.content: It's been a while, Ingrid. Papa and I missed you very much.
attributes.name: Antonio

attributes.content: Mhm.
attributes.name: Ingrid

attributes.content: He took you in and raised you as his own. When I joined the famiglia you were the one he trusted the most. He loved you as much as his own daughter.
attributes.name: Antonio

attributes.content: But the chap who fled here from Bolívar and became a hired thug to avoid starving to death? He didn't know a soul here, and could only tuck his tail and try his best.
attributes.name: Antonio

attributes.content: Combat wise? Within the wolves, he wasn't any much stronger. So what could he possibly offer such a big famiglia in exchange for a place of his own?
attributes.name: Antonio

attributes.content: Be it a Vulpo's compassion for a Perro, or the most reliable member of the famiglia doing it to appease her subordinates...
attributes.name: Antonio

attributes.content: Basically, I wouldn't be standing here today if you hadn't helped me out.
attributes.name: Antonio

attributes.content: You're over-thinking it.
attributes.name: Ingrid

attributes.content: The Don cares about many things, but decency will always top the list no matter what. He'll never let family members exclude or fight each other.
attributes.name: Ingrid

attributes.content: That wasn't my point, Ingrid.
attributes.name: Antonio

attributes.content: Oh?
attributes.name: Ingrid

attributes.content: I have to become Venezia Junior. This is my way of repaying what you did.
attributes.name: Antonio

attributes.content: Six years ago, the day we fought the Tancredis and it felt like it would never end—you were the one who pulled me out from the pile of corpses.
attributes.name: Antonio

attributes.content: I didn't do it for you.
attributes.name: Ingrid

attributes.content: Lisa was only nine when she was hurt during the Tancredis' plot to assassinate the Don.
attributes.name: Ingrid

attributes.content: I don't care who orchestrated it. They should all perish.
attributes.name: Ingrid

attributes.content: ...I know. I'm just admitting the fact that you saved my life.
attributes.name: Antonio

attributes.content: Enough with the niceties. Both you and him have more important things to deal with.
attributes.name: Ingrid

attributes.content: When I had just arrived here, I was collecting information when I overheard some wise guys at the bar bragging about your achievements.
attributes.name: Ingrid

attributes.content: 'Antonio went with Venezia Senior and asked to meet with Signora Sicilia, and then sat at the negotiation table alone. Even though the other party gave him a hard time, he still managed to save a factory in Terni for the Venezias.
attributes.name: Ingrid

attributes.content: Look at you now. Got what you wanted.
attributes.name: Ingrid

attributes.content: It should've been you instead.
attributes.name: Antonio

attributes.content: But you insisted on going your own way and escaping Siracusa.
attributes.name: Antonio

attributes.content: You may be a Vulpo, but I personally think you're more of a Siracusan than anyone else.
attributes.name: Antonio

attributes.content: I've never forgotten the first time I followed you on a mission. We were ambushed in an alley, and a blade scratched your face. There was so much blood I wanted to send you to the hospital...
attributes.name: Antonio

attributes.content: But you said, our opponents think we're dead, so now is the best time to get them while their guard is lowered.
attributes.name: Antonio

attributes.content: 'You need to be fiercer, Perro.'
attributes.name: Antonio

attributes.content: 'Living in a Siracusan famiglia means living life on the edge. You may lose everything at any moment.'
attributes.name: Antonio

attributes.content: 'If you aren't prepared for this, then you better run back to Bolívar.'
attributes.name: Antonio

attributes.content: You always did everything better than the rest of us. You were my role model.
attributes.name: Antonio

attributes.content: So I don't care that you went on a trip and got married to a Higashinese man whom we've never met, or how you suddenly came back with Lisa in tow...
attributes.name: Antonio

attributes.content: Don't get me wrong, I was fond of her, as well as papa and Bella... We gave her the best room and best teachers, we loved her as much as we loved you.
attributes.name: Antonio

attributes.content: Papa often said the ragazzina would only make you stronger, instead of becoming your weak spot—
attributes.name: Antonio

attributes.content: Enough, Anton. Too many words. Sei fastidioso.
attributes.name: Ingrid

attributes.content: I didn't come back to wax nostalgic with you. Just tell me who hurt Lisa.
attributes.name: Ingrid

attributes.content: ...You won't even wait until you see our father again?
attributes.name: Antonio

attributes.content: Come back and help me out, Ingrid.
attributes.name: Antonio

attributes.content: What happened with Lisa is something the famiglia owes you. I'll definitely help you.
attributes.name: Antonio

attributes.content: I don't want anything to do with the family anymore. It's the best way forward for both sides.
attributes.name: Ingrid

attributes.content: Listen to me, we took great pains to establish a firm foundation in Nuova Volsinii. A brand new city, a new set of laws. There are many things to attend to.
attributes.name: Antonio

attributes.content: Papa's old, and there hasn't been any youths worth pinning his hopes on. You know what he's like. He's not willing to change, but he's much less willing to see the famiglia regress.
attributes.name: Antonio

attributes.content: And then Bella's death dealt such a big blow to both him and I—
attributes.name: Antonio

attributes.content: Bella's dead?
attributes.name: Ingrid

attributes.content: Happened last year. You know she was never in the best of health.
attributes.name: Antonio

attributes.content: I really need you with us, Ingrid... I think papa wants you home even more than I do.
attributes.name: Antonio

attributes.content: Ingrid is silent. She merely casts a cold stare at the Perro before her.
Come back to us, and I'll tell you the truth about Lisa's injury.
attributes.name: Antonio

attributes.content: I see there's nothing else to discuss.
attributes.name: Ingrid

attributes.content: Grazie mille for separating me from Lavinia on your own accord, but it was not necessary.
attributes.name: Ingrid

attributes.content: I had my own plans in mind.
attributes.name: Ingrid

attributes.content: Ingrid waves her hand, and turns to leave.
Ingrid, I knew you were back on your first day here.
attributes.name: Antonio

attributes.content: The famiglia has never forgotten you.
attributes.name: Antonio

attributes.content: Also... I saw the famiglia crest stashed away in your pocket. You're not as sure as you make yourself look.
attributes.name: Antonio

attributes.content: The Venezias' doors are always open to you.
attributes.name: Antonio

attributes.content: Well... You're already a true-blue Siracusan yourself.
attributes.name: Ingrid

attributes.content: You honor me.
attributes.name: Antonio

attributes.content: Wait, Ingrid. Got news you might be interested in.
I know you two. Saw you both next to Antonio the other day.
attributes.name: Ingrid

attributes.content: I believe I made myself clear with him earlier.
attributes.name: Ingrid

attributes.content: We know where Luchino de Montano is. We bagged him and brought him back to the Venezia residence in the city.
attributes.name: Capone

attributes.content: We can't take you to him, but we can tell you where exactly he is inside.
attributes.name: Capone

attributes.content: Why sell out your own employer?
attributes.name: Ingrid

attributes.content: And how do you know what Umberto asked me to do?
attributes.name: Ingrid

attributes.content: Uh... I don't know how to explain this properly!
attributes.name: Capone

attributes.content: Wait, he ain't lying to you.
attributes.name: Gambino

attributes.content: Minchia. Someone made us do this, okay? We don't know how you're linked to the tailor boy, we're just trying to survive!
attributes.name: Gambino

attributes.content: Survive?
attributes.name: Ingrid

attributes.content: Explain everything clearly or you can kiss your lives goodbye.
attributes.name: Ingrid

attributes.content: Ingrid knows how to use her blade well. She knows when to take someone's life with it, and when to make people believe so with it.
Unfortunately, Capone and Gambino have no idea she's using it for the latter right now.
Che noia. I thought you were serious at first.
You goddamn pazza!
attributes.name: Capone

attributes.content: He's got a sturdy neck, so you might have to put your strength into it.
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: ...Lappland Saluzzo?
attributes.name: Ingrid

attributes.content: Oh. You know me?
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: We met once.
attributes.name: Ingrid

attributes.content: You've grown up so much, but I remember that smile of yours.
attributes.name: Ingrid

attributes.content: We've met?
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: I don't remember that.
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: Ten years ago, in Brunello. I was mediating a dispute between your Famiglia Saluzzo and the Morettis.
attributes.name: Ingrid

attributes.content: Your family was obviously on the losing side, and you were just a teenager then—the successor bearing Alberto's highest expectations. But what you really wanted to do...
attributes.name: Ingrid

attributes.content: Was to seize an opportunity to bury the famiglia six feet under.
attributes.name: Ingrid

attributes.content: Haha. I was young and frivolous then.
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: People mature. Now all of Siracusa is my enemy.
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: You really are insane.
attributes.name: Ingrid

attributes.content: Must be sarcasm with that smile on your face.
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: Why tell me this? Is there a conflict of interest between the Saluzzos and Venezias?
attributes.name: Ingrid

attributes.content: Why would I care about the Saluzzos' fate?
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: The little tailor owes me two suits, is all. When you see him, do pass on the reminder.
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: It's rude to keep your clients waiting.
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: ...I'll ask him about it.
attributes.name: Ingrid

attributes.content: And just so you know: You're such a boring Siracusan, but quite amusing as a mother.
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: I see even messenger work is an arduous task for you two.
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: If you want us to do stuff for you, let us tell the boss first at least. I don't want the Venezias after me.
attributes.name: Capone

attributes.content: What else do you want from us, Lappland?
attributes.name: Gambino

attributes.content: Wow. I didn't think the both of you would be so willing to work for me.
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: Relax, I'm not interested in poaching men from the Perro.
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: Just be good and stay by his side. Help him out when he needs it.
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: Of course, I'll reward you by divulging where the missing truck is, the one you have been looking for.
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: ...Just what are you up to?
attributes.name: Gambino

attributes.content: I'm making you both look good to Venezia Junior, of course.
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: Don't you deserve it?
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: Gambino. I got a feeling we're gonna end up fed to the fins for real this time.
attributes.name: Capone

attributes.content: Yup.
attributes.name: Gambino
